item.description: Today’s date is: %a %d %b Owl bet you'll lose this staring contest ðŸ¦‰ pic.twitter.com/eJh4f2zncC — San Diego Zoo Wildlife Alliance (@sandiegozoo) October 26, 2021

Note: at time of initial save, this was a draft. draft=true But, now it’s live draft=false So, at the time we’d have to see if it renders in the preview on dev wtih flag -D But now we expect all this text to render. At least as soon as we commit it, and maybe then cloudflare has a cronjob that only checks occasionally.
Questions: Is there a markdown code for date or time?
